the business so brilliantly,'' Page said in the statement. Eric Schmidt said this change has been under discussion`` for a long time'' as the company tries to`` simplify'' its management structure. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come, he said in the statement. Google's other co-founder Sergey Brin will oversee strategic projects, specifically new products. Editor, CIO Tarun Pandey, Vice President-IT, Aditya Birla Financial Services
